a.title: Archie R-V School District Meal Benefit Plan
a.span: Archie R-V School District Meal Benefit Plan

li.a: Archie R-V School District Meal Benefit Plan

p.span: Archie R-V School District Families and Community,

This year has been challenging at the very least. I know that many of you are heartbroken at the reality that students will not be going back to school for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Please know that the Archie R-V staff feel the same. We have had to make some difficult decisions on how we will end the year. Please see as follows:

li.span: The grading protocol for the second semester of the 2019-2020 school year will be Pass/Fail with the exception of students accessing Dual Credit and Virtual classes that require continuation of new material and/or have a grade assigned by an outside entity.
Prom is cancelled due to projected extensions on restrictions on gatherings and social distancing.

The 2019-2020 Archie R-V Graduation is rescheduled for July 12, 2020 at 2 p.m. The move of Graduation is in efforts to postpone Graduation to a time where a traditional ceremony could be observed. In the event that a traditional ceremony could not be held on July 12, 2020, a virtual ceremony will be initiated. At this time, the High School administration is developing the process and format for each of those options. Stay posted for future updates.

p.span: Ultimately, we thank you for the blessing of your children. This job is a calling and those that do it miss greatly the ability to be in the presence of your children.

April 9, 2020
Governor Parson Announces Schools Closed for the Year Missouri Governor Mike Parson announced in the Thursday, April 9 press briefing that Missouri schools shall remain closed through this school year. The Department of Elementary and Secondary Education (DESE), along with several school superintendents from across the state made the recommendation to Governor Parson on April 9.

div.span: The Archie school song melody is “Anchors Aweigh”. The words are as follows:

br.span: You are the school we love.
To you we will be true, true, true, true.
Through years of work and play, Courage we’ll show.

Red White Fight Fight
Red White Fight Fight
Red White Fight Fight Fight Fight Fight
